title: Instructional Design Process Based on the ICAP Framework for [Large-Scale] Learning Analytics (LA) Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational concepts of Learning Analytics (LA) and the ICAP Framework
context.additional_context: Emphasizing instructional design competencies through learning analytics tools for corporate education managers in science fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core concepts of learning analytics (LA) and their educational applications
Learners can apply the four ICAP framework stages (active, constructive, interactive, passive learning) to actual instructional design
Learners can design and implement personalized learning strategies through learning data analysis
Learners can suggest optimization methods using learning analytics tools when designing microlearning content for mobile environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
